question.body: Bacterial cells of the large intestine can be beneficial by:

response.feedback: Incorrect. Bacterial cells in the large intestine do not secrete hormones that influence humans.
Incorrect. Bacteria can ingest nutrients but that can result in gas and indigestion.
Incorrect. Gas production is a byproduct of bacterial fermentation and causes indigestion.
Correct. Bacteria in the large intestine can produce vitamin B and K which we need.
